name: Clinic Software CRM Online Shop
author: Clinic Software

sections.description:
Connect your WooCommerce shop to your ClinicSoftware.com CRM.

Clinic Software 速 is a full suite of tools in cloud based created to help Clinics, Doctors, Nurses, Spas, Salons to Grow Sales, Save Time & Get Organized. Looking for a CRM Software alternative? Ten steps ahead. Make running your business Smarter, Better, Faster. Instantly. Clinic Software 速.com is a fully-comprehensive SaaS (Software as a Service) in cloud based created to help companies and appointment-based businesses of any industry and size such as Clinics, Spas and Salons with tools that helps to Grow Sales, Save Time & Get Organized. It is also The Most Comprehensive Software (100+ Tools) according to our customers success stories. 98% of customers recommend ClinicSoftware.com Make running your business Smarter, Better, Faster. Instantly.

Connect your WooCommerce data to your ClinicSoftware Instance.
– sync all your clients

  • sync all your store products

  • sync all your store products

  • sync all your store coupons

  • view your imports and exports logs/feeds

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
sections.installation:
1. Make sure you have the WooCommerce plugin installed and active;
  2. Install clinicsoftware-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Your connection and more info you can find on Status page.

Works with the latest WooCommerce.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed bug related to the plugin slug
  • Tested with latest WordPress version

1.0.0

  • Initial release
